title: Special Ops Music Pack
description: This is a music pack featuring sixteen unique military action instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral and ambient effects, all of these pieces are available to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present Special Ops Music Pack! This is an asset pack that contains sixteen orchestral/ambient instrumentals geared towards the world of miltary combat. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.



Ashes Of A Spartan - F Minor - 120 BPM

Enemy Confirmed - A Minor - 95 BPM

Final Charge - D Minor - 160 BPM

Fubar - D Major - 120 BPM

Medal Of Honor - Eb Major - 140 BPM

Point Of Return - C Minor - 120 BPM

Prepare For Missle Launch - G Minor - 110 BPM

Still In The Fight - A Minor - 140 BPM

The Chase Ends Here - 90 Bpm - C Minor

The Final Mission - Eb Minor - 110 BPM

The Trench - 100 BPM - F Minor

The War Is Coming - C Minor - 120 BPM

War - C Minor - 120 BPM

We Got Contact - C Minor - 150 BPM

We Gotta Find Them - 120 Bpm - D Minor

Whisky Tango G Minor - 120 BPM


Audio Preview:

Please check out the rest of my asset packs!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 16

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 kHz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 31 minutes 12 seconds
